verbose_text: When strain THI503 was incubated in mineral salts medium with S 0 as the sole energy source, the pH of the medium decreased from 4.7 to 3.6, and 1.1 +/- 0.3 mol thiosulfate and 0.1 +/- 0.1 mol sulfate accumulated in 50 mL culture after 22 day.
evidence: pH of the medium decreased from 4.7 to 3.6, and 1.1 +/- 0.3 mol thiosulfate
